description:
My studio is an awesome, cozy and quiet little  space in the heart of Bed-Stuy.  It's in a great location, close to a ton of great coffee shops, restaurants, music clubs and bars.  It's perfect for one person or a couple!

The space is cozy - great light and high ceilings.  The bed is a full size bed, comfortable mattress. The kitchen and bathroom are separate.

Full kitchen, wifi

Just to drop off keys but happy to be in touch, answer any questions and/or recommend spots in the neighborhood!

Bed-Stuy has many beautiful tree and brownstone-lined streets, great bars and restaurants and is a friendly community.

Utica A, C
name: Cozy & Charming Bed-Stuy Studio
review: Amanda's place is really nice. I had a great time staying there. Close to the train and lots of walkable places in the neighborhood.
